scripts.print:name: echo '@gjsify/deno-runtime'
scripts.build: yarn print:name && yarn build:gjsify && yarn run build:types
scripts.build:gjsify: mkdir lib -p && gjsify build --library src/{core,ext,ops,runtime,types}/**/*.ts src/cli/{js,ops}/*.ts src/*.ts --exclude **/*.d.ts lib
scripts.copy:types: rm -rf lib/cli/tsc && mkdir -p lib/cli/tsc && cp -r src/cli/tsc/dts lib/cli/tsc/dts
scripts.build:test: yarn run build:test:gjs && yarn run build:test:deno
scripts.test: yarn run print:name && yarn run build && yarn run build:test && yarn run test:gjs && yarn run test:deno
scripts.git:upstream:init: cd src && git remote add upstream https://github.com/denoland/deno.git || exit 0
scripts.git:upstream:_merge: cd src && git fetch upstream && git merge upstream/main
scripts.git:upstream:merge: yarn git:upstream:init && yarn git:upstream:diff && yarn git:upstream:_merge
